sample_meetings.title: Q4 Budget Planning Meeting
sample_meetings.transcript: John: Good morning everyone. We need to finalize our Q4 budget by Friday. Sarah, can you prepare the financial projections? Sarah: Absolutely, I'll have the projections ready by Wednesday. Mike: What about the marketing budget? We discussed increasing it by 15%. John: Yes, that's approved. Lisa, can you coordinate with the marketing team? Lisa: I'll schedule a meeting with them tomorrow. Mike: Should we also discuss the hiring freeze? John: Let's table that for next week's meeting. Sarah: I'll send out the budget summary by Thursday. John: Perfect. Any other items? No? Great, let's wrap up.

sample_meetings.title: Sprint Planning Session
sample_meetings.transcript: Alice: Welcome to our sprint planning. We have 3 major features to complete this sprint. Bob: The user authentication feature is ready for development. Carol: I'll start on the payment integration. Dave: What about the mobile app updates? Alice: Those are lower priority. Bob: I need help with the database migration. Carol: I can assist with that. Dave: When do we need to have everything ready? Alice: End of next week. Bob: That's tight but doable. Carol: I'll create the task breakdown. Dave: I'll update the project timeline. Alice: Great, let's sync up daily.

sample_meetings.title: Client Check-in Call
sample_meetings.transcript: Sarah: Hi Mr. Johnson, thanks for joining us today. How are things going with the new system? Mr. Johnson: It's working well, but we're having some issues with the reporting feature. Mike: I can look into that. What specific problems are you seeing? Mr. Johnson: The reports are taking too long to generate. Mike: I'll optimize the queries. Sarah: Is there anything else we can help with? Mr. Johnson: The dashboard could use some improvements. Sarah: I'll add that to our roadmap. Mike: I'll send you an update by Friday. Mr. Johnson: Perfect, thank you both.

budget_meeting.summary: Q4 budget planning meeting focused on finalizing financial projections, approving 15% marketing budget increase, and coordinating team tasks for Thursday delivery.

action_items.task: Coordinate with marketing team on budget increase
